# System Architecture Specification Template (Advanced)

System
- Name

Purpose
- Business problem solved

Context
- Business drivers, technical landscape, constraints

System Context
- Users and external systems

Component Identification
- Component: responsibility, technology, interfaces

Interaction Patterns
- Pattern: when and why used

Data Flows
- Flow description steps

Integration Points
- Protocol, data format, error handling

Scaling Requirements
- Component scaling approach and targets

Security Boundaries
- Boundary and controls in place

Operational Characteristics
- Availability targets, performance targets, DR (RPO/RTO), deployment strategy

Architecture Decisions (ADR)
- Topic, context, decision, consequences

Technology Stack
- Layer and choices

Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] System-level criterion

Non-Functional Requirements
- Requirement: target and measurement
